metadata.title: CVE-2022-48860 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ethernet: Fix error handling in xemaclite_of_probeThis node pointer is returned by of_parse_phandle() with refcountincremented in this function. Calling of_node_put() to avoid therefcount leak. As the remove function do.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
